1.0.name: wordpress/wp-app-maker
1.0.description:
WP App Maker let you easily generate and start distributing an Android Mobile App for Wordpress just a few minutes after installing it. It requires a user registration just in order to enable the cloud app generation service.

Here are some of its powerful features:

  • Toolbar and text colors customization
  • Launcher Icon generator
  • Mobile Categories customization and filtering
  • Widget for publishing your QRCode on the sidebar
  • Usage tracking powered by Google Analytics (*)
  • Monetization based on AdWhirl services (*)
  • Images size optimization
  • Fast caching engine for offline usage

(*) features available only for the PRO version.

More details are available on the official website: wpappmaker.com

The 5 minutes setup

Sample App
